      private void commitRule()
      Commits all uncommitted rules in the database.
      private void createListeners()

      void fetchIPs()
      Empties FETCH Chain and then repopulates it from www.malwaredomainlist.com.
      private void launchCommitDialog()
      Launches dialog box informing user that the rule has been added to the database, but not yet applied and provides option to do or not do so.

      Called when the activity is first created.
      void sendUpdateNotification()
      Sends Android notification to user that the malicious IP address database has been updated.
